channel.title: Making A required smith lvl
channel.description: Alright so I made rare smithing and heres my tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,99811.0.html Somehow, people are able to smith rares at lvl 1...how can I fix it so they need 135?

item.title: Making A required smith lvl
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:5, topic:70059”]I’d say the problem is this block of statements:

if(barType == 2365) { //Rares with 'perfect' bar
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1101);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1101);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1099);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1100);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1099);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1100);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1088);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1088);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",8429);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",8429);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1105);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1105);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1098);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1098);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1092);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1092);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1083);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1083);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1104);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1104);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1103);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1106);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1103);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1106);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1086);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1086);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1087);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1108);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1087);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1108);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1085);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1107);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",13358);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1085);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1107);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",13358);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1102);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1102);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1093);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1093);
}
if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1094);
sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1091);
} else {
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1094);
sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1091);
}

You have so many if/else switches you’ve probably missed some. Combine them all into this

if(playerLevels[13] < 135){ /* SendQuest() all the options darkened*/ } else { /*SendQuest() all the options not darkened */ }[/quote]
Did that, 3 phats are still smithable at lvl 1
Mine now looks like this:

if(barType == 2365) { //Rares with perfect bar if(playerLevel[13] < 135) { sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1101); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1099); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1100); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1088); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",8429); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1105); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1098); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1092); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1083); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1104); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1103); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1106); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1086); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1087); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1108); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1085); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1107); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",13358); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1094); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1091); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1102); sendQuest("@bla@Rare@bla@",1093); } else { sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1098); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",8429); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1105); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1101); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1099); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1100); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1088); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1092); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1083); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1104); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1103); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1106); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1086); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1087); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1108); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1085); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1107); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",13358); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1102); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1093); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1091); sendQuest("@whi@Rare@whi@",1094); } addItemToSmith(4565,0,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1050,0,1120,1); addItemToSmith(1044,0,1121,1); addItemToSmith(962,0,1122,1); addItemToSmith(4566,0,1123,1); addItemToSmith(1040,1,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1961,1,1120,1); addItemToSmith(1055,1,1121,1); addItemToSmith(1959,1,1122,1); addItemToSmith(6860,1,1123,1); addItemToSmith(1037,2,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1048,2,1120,1); addItemToSmith(1055,2,1121,1); addItemToSmith(4083,2,1122,1); addItemToSmith(4079,2,1123,1); addItemToSmith(1419,3,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1046,3,1120,1); addItemToSmith(1053,3,1121,1); addItemToSmith(1042,3,1122,1); //addItemToSmith(0,3,1123); sendQuest("",1132); sendQuest("",1096); addItemToSmith(1057,4,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1038,4,1120,1); //addItemToSmith(1307,4,1121); sendQuest("",11459); sendQuest("",11461); addItemToSmith(6861,4,1122,1); //addItemToSmith(1307,4,1123); sendQuest("",1135); sendQuest("",1134); }

item.title: Making A required smith lvl
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“fireshadow299, post:2, topic:70059”]im not 100% percent sure it all looks fine but try this:

See this line?

if(playerLevel[13] < 135) {

Idont know if this will work but change it to

if(playerLevel[77] < 135) {

makes it where ur lvl 77 when u can make it.[/quote]

You’re stupid. That would cause a segmentation fault.
